name: Commuter Connector
description:
You are a train commuter who needs to get people to place to place as quick as possible. As you rush through the tracks, avoid random stops in the railroad by switching lines! Mind the gap!

This is a game made for my school's game jam. Made in only 11 hours, it is unimpressive, but also impressive to me for my progress in so little time.

I hope you enjoy! (This project won the best casual game category)

A and D to move along the tracks. Dont run into crates, barriers, or bombs, because you will die!

Made by Decacentum.
